about_the_game:
Survive the Apocalypse in Style!

In a world ravaged by a revolutionary supplement turned plague, survivors must fight against mutated creatures known as the "Addicted." This top-down survival shooter combines frantic action with strategic gameplay, challenging you to face increasingly intense dangers.

  • Unique Heroes: Choose from a variety of characters, each with exclusive abilities.

  • Weapons and Upgrades: Discover and enhance weapons to tackle ever-evolving challenges.

  • Epic Bosses: Confront formidable foes with unique attacks.

  • Bunker: Unlock new content and customizations by exploring the bunker and completing missions.

  • Graphics: Inspired by 1950s cartoons with a modern twist.

Step into a world filled with action, mystery, and strategy. Are you ready to face your fears and leave your mark? The fight for survival starts now!
